instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3024: What is 820-3024? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.A1370: What is A1370? A1370 is a model number for a 11 inch size MacBook Air from years Late 2010, Mid 2011 with EMC 2393, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-2796, 820-3024..

threads.title: MacBook Air 11" <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3024</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b EFI locked
threads.message:
Hi,
I have MacBook Air 11 <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1370</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3024</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B with locked EFI main board number <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3024</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B can someone remove this EFI lock for me please. I tried edit bios file remove $svs piece and FF this whole field as I found in some instructions online but from some reason after this laptop want power back on only fan spinning works fine with old dump. I tried also bios from <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3024</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-a but didn't work either don't have a clean for B version can someone help. Thanks
